dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, how can I help you?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I'm looking for a new smartphone. Can you recommend one?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Of course! What are your requirements and budget?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I need a smartphone with a good camera and a budget of $500.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I would recommend the iPhone SE or the Google Pixel 4a. Both have excellent cameras and fall within your budget.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Thanks for the suggestion! I'll check them out.
